name: Drawing Simulator
description:
Hey there...

I'm not gonna tell you anything about the game. I've meant it to be an experiences. but here are some information.

  • The game is in its alpha testing. So expect minor bugs. 
  • There is a telephone in the game its kinda important to pay attention to it. But its totally up to you.
  • At this stage of development the game has three endings including an endless mode. Easiest way to get to the endless mode is ignoring all the phone calls.
  • It is supposed to be frustrating. So please don't throw your Phone away.

Other than that. If you tried it, tell me if u like it or not. I'll be putting out the story, how i came up with it in a few days.

Also i want to make it open source so people can look at my code and roast me. And also i think I've done decent amount of beginner level programming and will be commenting and documenting it.  So its free for all

Check it out

https://github.com/Joesujin/Black_and_white

cheers
